availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James C. Westerfield (Mercer County, Kentucky, county surveyor)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, county surveyor. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Westerfield. Owned three enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1850. County surveyor in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 901.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 52.
Find A Grave, "James C. Westerfield (1783-1867)," Memorial #19507895, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19507895 (accessed May 22, 2018).
